meanings.definition: Consisting of one fold or layer.
meanings.sent1: The onefold paper airplane flew smoothly through the air.
meanings.sent2: The onefold blanket kept me warm during the chilly night.
meanings.sent3: The onefold cake was so thin, it almost disappeared on the plate.
meanings.sent4: Her onefold approach to problem-solving made her stand out in the team.
meanings.sent5: The onefold leaf floated gently down from the tree.

meanings.sent1: She onefolded the letter neatly before putting it in the envelope.
meanings.sent2: The tailor onefolded the fabric to create a seamless design.
meanings.sent3: He onefolded the dough to prepare it for baking.
meanings.sent4: The artist onefolding the canvas carefully to start painting.
meanings.sent5: The origami master onefolded the paper with precision and skill.
